title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.17 - Permission to land, take off or taxi overweight aircraft required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.17 - Permission to land, take off or taxi overweight aircraft required

State Regulations

No aircraft having an actual gross weight of over 100,000
pounds, including passengers, cargo, fuel, equipment, etc. shall land, take off
or taxi at the air terminal without permission of Pan American World Airways, Inc. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1271.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
